info.title: tackle-pathfinder
info.description:
Tackle PathFinder 0.0.4

Changes : 
* added delete assessment function
* added create assessment copying responses from another assessment
* added bulk creation/copy of assessments
* added identified risks function
* added assessment confidence function
* added multilanguage optional param for GetAssessment
* added get questionnaire header list

/assessments.summary: Path used to manage a single assessment.
/assessments.description:
The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete instances of an `assessment`.  
This path contains `GET`, `POST` operations used to perform the get a list of assessments and to create one.

400.description: When the request is not well formed.

parameters.name: fromAssessmentId
parameters.description: Setting this parameter will make API to create the assessment for the applicationId specified in the body to copy all answers and comments from an already existing assessment.

404.description: If the fromAssessmentId param is passed but that assessment can not be found.

post.summary: Creates an assessment associated to an applicationId. It can copy the responses from another assessment.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
ISO language code for the response
If not specified the language used will be the original language of the questionnaire

204.description: If the assessment gets deleted successfully

404.description: If the assessment to be deleted doesn't exist

delete.description: Checks if an assessment exists and deletes it.

200.description: when the update has been successful

400.description: When the body content is somehow incorrect : wrong ids, wrong values.

404.description: When the assessment can not be found

patch.summary: This operation will update the current Assessment using the assessmentId on the pathparam.
patch.description:
This operation will only consider the assessmentId specified in the pathparam to find the related Assessment.

Updatable values :
* status
* stakeholders
* stakeholderGroups
* questionnaire.category.comment
* questionnaire.category.question.option.checked

Only the information != null will be considered and modified. The rest will remain untouched.

post.summary: Async call to create a list of assessments for the given applications.
post.description: It will allow to copy the assessment answers from a given assessment ( in query params )

404.description: If bulk process is not found

/assessments/risks.summary: Will retrieve the risks for filtered assessments
/assessments/risks.description: The response will contain only those applications assessed. This can end on having 0 elements in the response.

stakeholderGroups.description: List of ids of stakeholder groups

questions.question: What's you favorite movie?
questions.description: This represents a multiple option choice

questions.question: How old are you?
questions.description: This represents a single option choice

options.answer: I'm too old to tell you

title.description: Title of the section. This will be represented as a Wizard's section

questions.description: List of questions that belongs to this section

comment.description: Comment from the user to the category

options.description: List of possible answers to the question. Applicable if variant=checkbox|radioButton.

description.description: Extra info. This will appear in the tooltip

example.question: What's you favorite movie?
example.description: This represents a multiple option choice

Get_QuestionOption.title: Root Type for question_option
Get_QuestionOption.description: A possible question's answer typically represented in a RadioButton

checked.description: Whether or not this option was selected by the user
